item.description: Don't miss the debut "Intercultural Mixer" of 2012! This month's networking event is themed "Maghreb Nights" and features the arts and culture of Morocco. Highlights include Moroccan drumming, dancing, and a photo exhibit by Brandeis University's Wajida Syed. Enjoy light refreshments, stunning views of Boston, and hip crowd. $ 5.00 Cover You can purchase tickets here. http://interculturalmixer2.eventbrite.com/

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: "Maghreb Nights Intercultural Mixer"
